sieh selbst:
    Planet p1(0,0,0,-2*M_PI*0.000003,0,0,0,0,0,1) ;
    Planet p2(0,1,0,2*M_PI,0,0,0,0,0,0.000003);
    verletalgorithm(p1,p2,0.01,10000000);
    //rungeKuttaMethod(p1,p2,0.01,10000000);

Ausgabe im letzten zyklus
